entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued December 22 at 10:51PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...FRONT WILL BRING HEAVY SNOW TO THE HIGHWAYS... .Area of surface low pressure will track north towards south- central Alaska. The associated front will swing south to north over the panhandle. Cold air ahead of the front will bring snow to the northern Lynn Canal area. entry.cap:areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
